unit.utterance: yek āghayi dāšte az deraxt golābi mičide
unit.utterance_translation: A man was picking pears from a tree

unit.utterance: bad az deraxt miāyad payin sabade golābihā rā migozārad ān pāyin az tuye pišbandaš dar miyāvarad golābihā rā
unit.utterance_translation: Then he climbes down the tree, puts he basket of pears down, takes out the pears from his cloth

unit.utterance: bad yekiš rā barmidārad mimālad be pirāhanaš ke boxorad
unit.utterance_translation: then he picks one of them, cleans it with his shirt in order to eat it

unit.utterance: yek āghāyi ham az ān kenār dāšte rad mišode dāšte gusfandaš bozaš rā miborde čerā
unit.utterance_translation: another man was passing and he was grazing his sheep or his goats

unit.utterance: bad in āgha dobāre miravad bālāye deraxt ke golābi bečinad yek pesar bačeyi bā dočarxe miāyād
unit.utterance_translation: then he climbes up the tree again to pick pears. A boy comes on his bike.

unit.utterance: in pesarbače barmidārad sabade golābihā rā migozārad jeloye dočarxeaš
unit.utterance_translation: the boy takes the basket of pears and puts it in the front of his bike

unit.utterance: Tuye rāh ke dāšte mirafte yek dočarxesavāre digar az kenāraš rad mišavad In havāsaš part mišavad čarxe dočarxeaš miravad ruye sang
unit.utterance_translation: on his way while another bike is crossing right beside him, he gets distracted and his bike hits a stone
it falls and all the pears spill out

unit.utterance: Se tā pesar bače dāštand ānjā bāzi mikardand
unit.utterance_translation: three little boys were playing around

unit.utterance: in se tā pesarbače miāynd beheš komak mikonand Golābihā ra jam mikonand
unit.utterance_translation: these three boys come to help him gather the pears.

unit.utterance: Pesar bačehe āmad ke dobāre savāre dočarxe beshavad beravad
unit.utterance_translation: the little boy wants to get on the bike and ride away

unit.utterance: Yek dafe ān se tā pesar bače mibinand ke kolāhaš oftāde Sut mizanand miistad
unit.utterance_translation: Suddenly the three boys find out that the boy's hat was left there so they whistle to call him, he stops.

unit.utterance: bad kolāhaš rā beheš midahand In ham se tā golābi be ānhā midahad
unit.utterance_translation: they give him his hat and he gives them back three pears in return

unit.utterance: Pesar bačeh miravad bā dočarxeaš va
unit.utterance_translation: the boy went away on his bike

unit.utterance: Dobāre nešān midahad ān āqāyi ke bālāye deraxt bude dāšte golābi mičide miāyd pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: again it is shown that the man who is on the tree picking the pears climbs down

unit.utterance: mibinad ey vāy yeki az sabadhāye golābiaš nist kame
unit.utterance_translation: he sees that one of the baskets is not there, it's gone.

unit.utterance: Hamān moqe ān se tā pesar bačeyi ke dāštand golābi mixordand az kenāraš rad mišavand ba ta'ajob az kenārešān rad mišavad va fekr mikonad kāre ānhā ast
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time those three boys who are eating pears passing him by, he is crossing surprisingly while wondering whether the boys have stolen the pears
